document_name: Kukes Region Cross Border Cooperation programme
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ALB/00058235/72273 Kukes Region Cross Border Cooperaiton Prodoc.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The project is aiming to strengthen Kukes Region stakeholders' capacities and prepare the institutional framework for full participation and implementation of Cross Border Cooperation Programmes when available. The project is expected to contribute in setting the ground for a fully-fledged Cross Border Cooperation Programme Albania  Kosovo if and when available through mirroring a future Cross Border Cooperation programme between both countries in both structures and operations. It will also support the implementation of Cross Border Cooperation related small-scale interventions in infrastructure and capacity building.

It will also support the implementation of Cross Border Cooperation related small-scale interventions in infrastructure and capacity building.
